article_title: Why Walgreen Won't Stop Selling Tobacco Like CVS Health

article_metadata.description: CVS Health (CVS) rival Walgreen (WAG) isn’t going to stop selling cigarettes and other tobacco products anytime soon. Walgreen certainly has myriad financial reasons to keep selling cigarettes. It is faced with cutting costs as it consolidates various functions in its merger with European drugstore giant Alliance Boots. It decided against an “inversion” [...]
